roleset.name: (cause to) become solid, strong, or united, hard, dense, sturdy, reliable
roleset.note: SOLIDIFY-V NOTES: Based on survey of sentences in WSJ. Member of VNcls other_cos-45.4. (from solidify.01-v)

example.name: solidify-v: transitive
example.text: The additions solidify American 's position as the third-largest U.S. transatlantic carrier , behind PanAm Corp. 's Pan American World Airways and Trans World Airlines .
example.arg: American 's position as the third-largest U.S. transatlantic carrier , behind PanAm Corp. 's Pan American World Airways and Trans World Airlines

example.name: solidify-v: intransitive
example.text: Now , however , as [the court 's new five-member conservative majority]-1 continues [*-1]to solidify , victories for the liberals are rare .

roleset.name: be in a solid state, strong, united, hard, dense, sturdy, reliable
roleset.note: SOLID-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from solid.01-j)

example.name: solid-j: arg1
example.text: I agree with yours . My concern s in experience . Seems willing to do whatever , pokes around systems but *PRO* not solid in marketing , management areas !
